topics.body: We're supposed to see Age of Ultron today but it seems stupid crap keeps happening to delay us from going.

topics.body: Happy 5800 Pages
topics.author: 505696b47f123b37e800effa

topics.body:
"@Carcass Strife":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5543a90f63687239574f1100#post_5543a90f63687239574f1100
Since our mom is at work we have to use our grandparents car.

But they keep using it. At first I understand cuz they were doing bills.

But what happened was my brother went to go ask to use the car which they said ok.

But than we found out the road we usually take is closed so my Uncle (He lives here too) offered to take us since we don't know other routs.

We sort of think its not needed so we just found a rote online. So I told my brother that we should go early to make sure we get there. 

All of a sudden my Uncle takes the car without warning and we're like "Uhhhh, What?" and so my brother goes and asked our Grandma what happened and she didn't know.

So than my brother calls our uncle to which he replies "I forgot to pay my phone bill"...Which is something you can do with your phone.

And than he replies "This might take an hour or less" the movie starts at 1:30.

And by the way he literally just offered to take us not even a minute ago so he knew we were about to get going. 

And than he says he's going to drop off at McDonalds. And its like Dude, We literally said we were about to go. 

AND we don't know what we're doing because of the rout change.
topics.author: 50c204917f123b31440000a5

also read the description
"Introducing Soul of Chogokin Gun Buster Gokin Color Ver.! Gun Buster is a classic favorite among fans and appears this time in a stunning coloration concept authentic to the original anime. The body has an additional hint of purple that adds depth to the shadows, while the red highlights on the chest and orange lines along the body get a lavish metallic finish. "
this ain't no toy. this is _art_
